title: Lapse of department of education appropriations
context: [§40-87] Lapse of department of education appropriations. Upon the lapse of an appropriation to the department of education, moneys which remain unencumbered shall be returned to the state treasury within ninety days. [L 1986, c 321, §3] Note Repeal of section by L 1986, c 321, §12 as amended by L 1987, c 283, §69; L 1989, c 371, §7; L 1991, c 163, §3; L 1993, c 314, §2; L Sp 1993, c 8, §22; L 1997, c 180, §1; L 1998, c 115, §24; and L 2005, c 137, §1 deleted by L 2006, c 161, §7.
